Word2Vec1D.name: vector-length
Word2Vec1D.desc: specify the length of the output vector

Word2Vec1D.desc: minimum occurrence for a word to be in the word2vec

Word2Vec1D.desc: specify is pretrained word2vec is binary

Word2Vec1D.name: max-len
Word2Vec1D.desc: words limit of the issue text

Word2Vec1D.name: use-stemming
Word2Vec1D.desc: stem the words in the text

Word2Vec1D.name: use-lemmatization
Word2Vec1D.desc: Use lemmatization on words in the text

Word2Vec1D.name: use-pos
Word2Vec1D.desc: Enhance words in the text with part of speech information

Word2Vec1D.name: class-limit
Word2Vec1D.desc: limit the amount of items per class
